channel.title: Can I customize the Drafts iOS widget theme?
channel.description:
Is there are way to change the colour layout of the Drafts widget on iOS?
I want to make the icons on each tile pure white and the rest transparent or true black. I'd also like it if I could remove the words "Drafts" that appear below the widget. See mockup for what I mean:
![Screen Shot 2021-04-21 at 8.18.25 PM|493x500](upload://mwfvzhK4woowHZzDEfF4yCMU4uH.png)

item.title: Can I customize the Drafts iOS widget theme?
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
There are only the built-in light and dark theme options for the widget at this time.

Transparency and making the name disappear are not options Apple supports, and not possible.

Most customization options may come down the road. Can’t promise a timeframe.
